lead_paragraph: FECHTNER--Jerome, DDS. A true visionary in his beloved field of dentistry and a wonderful mentor to many like myself. A great friend to be cherished and missed. His family is blessed with his memory and legacy. Miles and Sandy Lazerwitz 1/3
